Posts.Content: HiÂ  I just wanted to link up with any of you with ibc as have just had results of my op and tumour really responded to chemo but lymph nodes did not. Is it likely that with ibc it had already spread to lymph nodes and why did they not respond? Having letrozole and radiotherapy. How do they test that next set of lymph nodes are clear? Am worried as consultant said have had a differential response to chemo. How are you getting on? Am HER2.
Posts.Title: What is the prognosis for inflammatory breast cancer
